title: "Frozen Worldscape"
content:
# Frozen Worldscape

Welcome to Frozen Worldscape, a website dedicated to exploring the beauty and mystery of distant planets. Our mission is to provide you with stunning images and information about the most fascinating worlds in our universe.

Through our collection of high-quality photographs and articles, we aim to transport you to otherworldly landscapes and spark your imagination. From icy glaciers to volcanic deserts, each planet has its own unique character waiting to be discovered.

Join us on this journey of exploration and discovery. Whether you are an avid space enthusiast or simply curious about what lies beyond our own planet, Frozen Worldscape has something for everyone.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a glacier on a distant planet, with the blue and white colors contrasting against the dark sky."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
